text.text: By the Order of the Silver Lance and under the supervision of I Urist Ironhammer, use this text to bestow knowledge of the order and its long history.
Since the order founded in 1710, followers of Silver Lance have marveled over his superior crafstmanship. Of which many have tried to mimic which included I the most skilled Dwarven craftsman.

Within the following pages are secrets long 
kept by the order, caution and discretion are adviced to avoid revalation or personal harm.
